original_text: When he was at the table with them, he took bread, gave thanks, broke it and began to give it to them.
korean_text: 그들과 함께 음식 잡수실 때에 떡을 가지사 축사하시고 떼어 그들에게 주시니

sentences.original_text: When he was at the table with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들과 함께 식탁에 있을 때

sentences.original_text: and began to give it to them
